alert.note: Alert for Harris; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:44PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Upson, Talbot and eastern Harris Counties through 515 PM EST... At 444 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Hamilton, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, Shiloh, Ellerslie, Baldwinville, Cataula, Baughville, Flint Hill, Olive Branch, Po Biddy Crossroads, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Pleasant Hill, Sunnyside and Prattsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for west central Georgia.
